All patient divide four group accord retinal artery lesions.The endpoint main adverse cardiovascular cerebrovascular event ( MACCE ) , include all-cause death , myocardial infarction ( MI ) , stroke 3 6 year follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Researches Retinal Artery Lesions Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine whether retinal artery lesion predict long-term adverse outcome acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) patient drug-eluting stent ( DES ) implant . A total 660 consecutive patient ACS underwent coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention enrol study Beijing Mentougou District Hospital , Beijing Tiantan Hospital Beijing Shijitan Hospital . All subject divide two group base retinal artery lesion : Group 1 , retinal artery lesions≤ Stage 2 ( n=296 ) group 2 ( n=364 ) , retinal artery lesion > Stage 2 . Beside , eye fundus examination do patient mesure extent severity atherosclerotic vascular lesion retinal artery . Patients exclude study severe nephropathy ( GFR < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) , vascular obstruction , acute illness condition think contraindicate coronary angiography . Primary endpoint all-cause mortality . The composite endpoint define major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event ( MACCE ) , namely recurrent serious angina pectoris , nonfatal MI , revascularization stroke .
DOC.criteria: consecutive patient ACS perform coronary angiography ( CAG ) percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . Patients exclude study heart failure , malignancy , renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 133µmol/L ) , liver disease , stroke severe lung disease .
